participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and free-spirited, I thrive on spontaneity and exploring the world around me.
participant_1.background: I enjoy hitchhiking. Formal situations make me uncomfortable. I live alone. I have over 4000 friends on facebook. I have not spoken to my family in years.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Creative and quirky, I love to bring joy to the unusual things in life, like naming my pets in a fun way.
participant_2.background: I have a few pet iguanas. I am pretty poor financially. I like to give them sassy sounding names that actually help people think nice things. I think dogs could learn to read if they were trained well. I have a brother but we do not talk much yet.

content.text: Hi, I'm John. I enjoy hitchhiking.
Hi, I'm Mary. I have a few pet iguanas.
Cool, I've always wanted a pet reptile.
They're pretty fun. What's your favorite thing about hitchhiking?
I like the freedom of it. I can go wherever I want, whenever I want.
That's true. It can be a lot of fun. I'm not very good at it, though.
It takes some practice. But once you get the hang of it, it's great.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should. It's a lot of fun. What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music. But I'm really into rock and roll right now.
Me too! I love rock and roll. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like a lot of different bands, but I'm really into the Foo Fighters right now.
The Foo Fighters are great! I saw them in concert a few years ago. They were amazing.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
You should definitely go if you ever get the chance. They're a great live band.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. It was nice talking to you, Mary.
You too, John. Have a nice day.
